newsitem.title: POLAND: Mostostal-W revises up '97 group net view.
newsitem.headline: Mostostal-W revises up '97 group net view.

text.p: Polish builder Mostostal Warszawa SA has raised its 1997 group net profit forecast to eight million zlotys from the 7.2 million forecast earlier in the year, the firm said in a statement on Tuesday.
The Mostostal group netted 5.1 million zlotys last year.
Mostostal said group sales would rise to 285 million zlotys this year against the earlier forecast 230 million and the 144.4 million recorded last year.
It said parent net would rise to 6.8 million zlotys this year from the six million earlier forecast and last year's 4.4 million.
Parent sales would rise to 225 million against the 170 million earlier forecast and last year's 114.4 million.
